definitions.definition: To tread heavily, especially to crush underfoot.
definitions.example: Mother yelled at my brothers for tromping through her flowerbed.
The team had been tromped by their cross-town rivals, and the players were embarrassed to show their faces in school the next day.

definitions.definition: A blowing apparatus in which air, drawn into the upper part of a vertical tube through side holes by a stream of water within, is carried down with the water into a box or chamber below which it is led to a furnace.
